name: Survive To Connect
description:
This game was made around the theme of "connect" for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4. Survive to Connect is a two-player, bullet-hell game where the players have to survive waves of enemies and then connect together, in order to move on to the next level.

Controls:

R - Restart

Esc - Exit/Quit

WASD - Player One Movement

Arrow Keys - Player Two Movement

Spacebar - Shoot

A thing players need to keep in mind is how much they shoot because their stamina and health are the same. Shooting lowers the players' health.
